name: npl-formatter
description: A formatter library for the Network Programming Language
author: Martin Halliday

scripts.generate:buildinfo.linux: echo 'export const buildInfo = { version: "'$npm_package_version'", date: new Date('$(date +%s)'000) }' > ./src/buildInfo.ts
scripts.generate:buildinfo.win: echo export const buildInfo = { version: "1.0", date: "%date%" } > ./src/buildInfo.ts
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm install && npm run clean:buildinfo.win
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run generate && npm run compile
